ShiftWorkTopic.name: ShiftWorkTopic
ShiftWorkTopic.description: Represents the relationship between a Shift object and a Work Type or Work Type Group object for Salesforce Scheduler.

AreAllTopicsSupported.description: Indicates whether the shift supports all work type or work type groups (true) or not (false).

AttendeeLimit.description: The maximum number of attendees for a group service appointment in a shift. This field is considered when the appointment mode is Group. Available in API version 61.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the current user last viewed a record related to this object.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this object.

MaxAppointments.description: The maximum number of appointments allowed for each time slot for a shift. This field is considered when WorkTypeId or WorkTypeGroupId is provided. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

Name.description: The name of this shift-work topic relationship.

ShiftId.description: The ID of the shift that’s related to the work type indicated in the WorkTypeId field or the work type group indicated in the WorkTypeGroupId field.

WorkTypeGroupId.description: The ID of the work type group that’s related to the shift indicated in the ShiftId field.

WorkTypeId.description: The ID of the work type that’s related to the shift indicated in the ShiftId field.
